h:head.h:title: IMCI Protocol

select1.label: CLASSIFY: Child should be treated for with

trigger.label: An antibiotic has already been given for ; there is no need to give an additional antibiotic for dysentery
An antibiotic has already been given for ; there is no need to give an additional antibiotic for the ear problem
An antibiotic has already been given for ; there is no need to give an additional antibiotic for the malaria

TREAT: Dry the ear at least 3 times daily; Roll clean absorbent cloth or soft, strong tissue paper into a wick; Place the wick in the child's ear; Remove the wick when wet; Replace the wick with a clean one and repeat these steps until the ear is dry
